Welcome {{customers.firstname}}

import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; import{RegistrationService}from'../../app/registration.service'; import { ActivatedRoute } from'@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { constructor(private api:RegistrationService,private activatedRouter:ActivatedRoute){} logout():void { this.api.logout(); } userId:string=""; customers:any; ngOnInit():void{ this.activatedRouter.params.subscribe(data=> this.userId=data.id); this.api.getCustomers(this.userId).subscribe(data=> this.customers=data; } getUserRole() { return localStorage.getItem('userRole'); } }
